text:
The definition set out
in IB 779.384 shall be used to identify establishments to which the Sec
13(b)(27) exemption will apply. As a rule-of-thumb the establishment will be
considered to be “primarily engaged in the exhibition of motion pictures” if
50% or more of the presentation time is devoted to the showing of motion
pictures.
